amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to make technical changes to the bill, as well as additional provisions relating to Corps of Engineers projects and reports. Additionally, it addresses a direct spending issue in sec. 306.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Shuster.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
